Reviews.Title: Beyond Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Zeimis "General Mayhem"
Reviews.Content: This is the ultimate laptop! Whether you just got into the Mac world, or you have been using these awesome computers for years, this laptop will suit you! I'm just a normal college student with normal computer needs! This laptop flips every bill I could put up! Even down to upgrading, it excels! I put in 4 GB of RAM so quickly and so easily! No messy innards to remove, just slid out the battery and boom, there you go! I love it! Don't hesitate, if you're looking for an all-around amazing laptop! Just get a mac!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Damn Good
Reviews.Author: Brian Robinson "Tecnogeek"
Reviews.Content: I have to be honest right away.  I'm an Apple lover.  If Apple makes it (or "made" it) I've got it.  I bought a slightly different model a little over a year.  Needless to say, I absolutely love it!  The more I used it, the more I fell in love in love with more hobbies; media, making music and videos, photography, web surfing, and software development.  All because I switched over from PCs to Mac!  Notice I said PC"s".  A Mac will in fact, last about 8-12 years.  As long as you take good care of it, it will fit inside that time frame and then some.

Reviews.Title: Info Not Disclosed
Reviews.Author: Amuir
Reviews.Content: Item not as pictured and note attached that Audio didn't work ( was not informed of this prior) -  Simple answer....I would'nt buy from seller again

Reviews.Title: Money well spent.
Reviews.Author: Alicia Smith
Reviews.Content: I brought this computer for my daughter and it works like a charm.  I gave it to my computer guy and he checked it out updated it and it's good to go.  Thanks so much for being an honest seller and selling a great machine.  My daughter loves it.  All the bestMs Smith

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook MB402LL/a
Reviews.Author: Cecil B Arnold
Reviews.Content: The MacBook was as advertised. It is clean with no blemishes.The only problem that I had was when I transferred from my older desk top, the folder that had the Office 2008 disappeared.Cecilba

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: princessjessy
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product, especially if you want Apple quality without the cost of buying a brand new Mac. It's perfect for anyone who can't afford to buy a newer model, and it works great with OS X Lion (if you upgrade the RAM). However, if you have the money, I'd suggest getting a newer model with a bigger hard drive, just so that it will not need to be replaced as soon to keep up with modern technology. Over all, I'd say it's a good product, though.

Reviews.Title: It's works okay
Reviews.Author: lorna
Reviews.Content: This item is okay I would not really recommend this for due hundred $99 is not really worth it I can pick one up on craigslist for cheaper

Reviews.Title: Macbook 13" mid 2007 computer- I feel like I have a brand new computer and it works like one
Reviews.Author: jasmine calhoun
Reviews.Content: I just bought this notebook and I love it.Ive really wanted a mac for a very long time(I have an iPhone and am a fan of apple) and Ive had problems with PCs throughout the years getting multiple viruses and slowing down and literally breaking down and falling apart. I needed a new computer asap and couldn't afford the brand new macs and I was going to buy a brand new hp or something , however I came across this computer in my computer repair shop and couldn't resist it. This computer was so ahead of its time, so advanced. Mine is a mid 2007 mac and it works just like a brand new computer,its pretty fast and responsive. I have a gateway pc that is falling apart  that I bought around 2006, so I've been taking sometime to learn the mac system. Once I'm able to afford the brand new macs I will definitely purchase one of those,this computer is such great quality that it seems like it will last for years to come to hold me over. My mac is upgraded to to the 10.7 version and has 2gb memory and the hard drive is updated/upgraded to 320gb. I paid 300$ for it and I love this computer, i can't keep my hands off of it. =)

Reviews.Title: what i needed
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: came very early, the customer service was very helpful when resolving small issues,runs my installed photoshop great i upgraded the ram capacity to help productivity

Reviews.Title: lost for words!
Reviews.Author: Karina Stoute
Reviews.Content: i am giving this seller/product 5 stars and will explain why:1. bought 2 13.3 inch white macbooks (old version) i think 2008 versions, the product condition was described as "very good", BUT when i opened the boxes i was surprised to find that both computers conditions were like new, on the outside just minor and almost non existent scratches (due to normal use - BUT if this is an issue for you, it can easily be corrected by buying a hard cover), screen did not have any scratches on it or the usual keyboard marks on it and the keyboard, trackpad, etc - everything in optimal conditions and immaculate (like new!!)2. Shipping - i was a bit nervous about the shipping of these, because it indicated that it was going to take almost one week to receive the laptops, BUT again really surprised on how fast i ended up receiving these - i purchased both on a friday and received my packages on Monday afternoon.So far i am really happy with my purchase, i might come back in a month or so to add a review about the performance (that has until now has been great), thank you pacific macs.
